boardgame.name: Tumblin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Dice
Tumblin-Dice
boardgame.description: A dexterity dice game consisting of four sets of colored dice one either slides, rolls, or flicks down a stepped surface. Usually one slides the die for better accuracy. After each person has slid their 4 dice, points are scored. You score the die roll times a multiplier of either 1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;times;, 2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;times;, 3_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;times;, or 4_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;times; depending on which area of the board the die is on. (Dice which land in the 0_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;times; region are immediately removed from play.) High scoring rolls are targets for opponents. Four rounds are played and the player with the most points win._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Tumblin-Dice Jr. is the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;travel_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; version._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The 2008 edition from Ferti Games states is for 2-6 players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

I am selling a copy of the game Tumblin-Dice that is in mint condition. I have only played this game with my family once and they didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t seem to appreciate it unfortunately...so instead of watching it sit in my closet, I am hoping someone else can give it a better home. Included with the game board are all original dice as well as the dry erase marker that is used for scoring. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re in or near Cincinnati, Ohio - you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re more than welcome to pick the game up. I am willing to ship the game, but it might be a little costly due to size/weight of the game. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re interested in having it shipped, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have to get the cost from UPS. Thanks for your interest and please let me know if you have any questions.

Brand new in shrink wrap. English Gryphon Games edition. Note that this is a heavy (BGG lists it at 6.77 pounds) and the box is relatively big.

This was the last prototype sent to Gryphon games right before producing the latest edition. There were no stickers, so I printed see-through stickers and placed them on the board. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s wooden and the actual size of the final piece produced, with wooden _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;stopper_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; pegs on the last three _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;tongues_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; (X4 spots) There are NO DICE, NO BOX, and NO RULES. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve printed a one-page rule sheet which I can include if you like. The wood is dusty and a bit dirty, but can be cleaned as it is slick. This is a very usable copy of the game! I will ship via USPS after payment is received. I charge only exact shipping costs. I will combine shipping with multiple items. From US zip code: 97520.
